description: Adobe ColdFusion versions July 12 release (2018.0.0.310739), Update 6 and earlier, and Update 14 and earlier have a use of a component with a known vulnerability vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: July 12 release (2018.0.0.310739), Update 6 and earlier, and Update 14 and earlier versions
